result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jahree Vaughtae Smith

records.addlTxt:
Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense; signed, filed, and distributed. 
Attorney Annette Rauch.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Order to Show Cause hearing. Discussion placed on the record. State Public Defender's Office failed to timely appoint counsel for the Defendant. Statements by Defendant. For reasons stated on the record, Court found Defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel at COUNTY EXPENSE. Court appointed Attorney Annette Rauch to represent Defendant in this matter at County Expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court ordered the Defendant is NOT REQUIRED to reimburse Milwaukee County; however, Court ordered the Defendant to pay a one-time fee of $60.00 by the completion of the case. Case adjourned for Status of Counsel hearing, Branch 46.
Status of Counsel hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:45 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
OSPD APPOINTMENT OF COUNSEL REPORT; received and filed.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status of Counsel hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Public Defender's Office has NOT been able to appoint counsel for Defendant. Statements by Defendant. Court ordered case adjourned for Order to Show Cause hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Clerk provided two potential dates to RYOC. Information provided to the Public Defender's Office. 

Order to Show Cause hearing scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:45 am. hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status of Counsel hearing. Discussion placed on the record. The Public Defender's Office has NOT been able to appoint counsel for Defendant. Case adjourned for Status of Counsel hearing, Branch 46. Clerk provided information to the PD's Office. Status of Counsel hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 08:30 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in Court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Defendant and Defense appeared via Zoom Video Conference. State appeared in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Discussion placed on the record. Defense advised the Court of Defendant's request for new counsel. Court held colloquy with Defendant. Court GRANTED Defense Motion to Withdraw as Counsel. Court VACATED Jury Trial date. Court ordered case adjourned for Status of Counsel hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Clerk provided information to the Public Defender's Office.  Status of Counsel hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Attorney Brett Lee Copeland in court, defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith not in court, in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

HELD OFF THE RECORD VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.
Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Defendant was not produced for hearing. Parties selected new Final PreTrial date. Case adjourned for Final PreTrial hearing and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Final PreTrial hearing scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 8:45 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Jury Trial scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
State's Requested Jury Instructions; received and filed.
State's Witness List; received and filed.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jahree Vaughtae Smith appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for a status hearing. Defense reports that all discovery has been received and request final pre-trial and jury trial dates. COurt scheduled final pre-trial and jury trial dates with parties. Case ajdourned to Branch 46.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in Court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**JUDGE FEISS AND ALL PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Defense advised the Court of discovery material issues. Court ordered Defense and State to meet 48 hours in advance of the next Court date. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for April 29, 2022 at 09:45 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court took judicial notice of 19CF5541. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective. M. Finkley.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing.  SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with MBR (09/12/1998)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent. Student Intern Maryann Corea under the supervision of Stephen Sargent. Defendant Jahree Vaughtae Smith in custody.  Edward OBrien appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jahree Vaughtae Smith appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.   Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jahree Vaughtae Smith
Current: 2424 E Webster Place, Milwaukee, WI 53211   (Effective: 01-10-2022)
Prior: 4331 North 27th Street, #6, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
